verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: spoke] [ARG2: to thousands of police officers from around the country] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] . They 're in the nation 's capital for National Police Week . He praised them for their work and promised more resources for them .
